section.p: Place a decoupling capacitor (0.1 uF, 0402 or smaller) on the power pins of all internal and external connectors to reduce power noise. These connectors include HDMI, DP, eDP, USB, Type C, FPC connectors, M.2, PCIe edge connector, etc.
